item.title: Dora Carrington
item.description: Dora Carrington was an artist loosely affiliated with the Bloomsbury Group and noted for her unconventional lifestyle. Despite a short career, her work had a great impact and a retrospective at the Pallant House Gallery in Chichester brings together some of her major works.
